name: 宠物大作战 - 升级版怪物实时大作战
name_original: 宠物大作战 - 升级版怪物实时大作战
description:
There was a harmonious, Happy, Peaceful meow village, But monsters suddenly came beat the hunters and break all up. Everything is in state of chaos. There is no way but to fight. Hunter heroes rise up to fight against the enemy.

Casual shooting game and a little of parkour game, Control of different monster hunter cats, or a union, Beat the demons and ghosts out of the village, To keep a peaceful and happy life.
